Mare-Concordis.name: Mare Concordis
description: The Mare Concordis is the largest ocean on Centhris, spanning from the eastern coast of Ulfwyst to the western coast of Cuncascus and the southern coast of Eastern Koraxon.

Mare-Umbra.name: Mare Umbra
description: The Mare Umbra is an ocean on Centhris, spanning from the eastern coast of Koraxon to the western coasts of Cuncascus and Entos.

Mare-Dyskira.name: Mare Dyskira
description: The Mare Dyskira is an ocean on Centhris, spanning from the wester coasts of Ulfwyst to the southern coast of Cuncascus.

Mare-Amnatis.name: Mare Amnatis
description: The Mare Amnatis, better known by its common name, the Sea of Lost Souls, is an ocean on Centhris, spanning from the wester coasts of Ulfwyst and Koraxon to the eastern coasts of Cuncascus.

Makorian-Sea.name: Makorian Sea
description: The Makorian Sea is a small, inland sea in the continent of Koraxon.

North-Lesdys-Sea.name: North Lesdys Sea
description: The North Lesdys Sea is a large sea west of the continent of Koraxon. It is a sub-region of the Mare Dyskira.

Jade-Depths.name: Jade Depths
description: The Jade Depths are a large sea that is south of the continent of Koraxon. It is a sub-region of the Mare Concordis.

Venngar-Sea.name: Venngar Sea
description: The Venngar Sea is a large sea that is south of Isdrage Bay. It is a sub-region of the Mare Concordis.

Isdrage-Bay.name: Isdrage Bay
description: The Isdrage Bay is an inland sea that is south of the Korin Gulf and flows into the Venngar Sea. It connects to the @;Koring Gulf;@ via the Strait of Krigere.

Korin-Gulf.name: Korin Gulf
description: The Korin Gulf is a large inland sea that is south of the Bay of Claws and north of Isdrage Bay.

Bay-of-Claws.name: Bay of Claws
description: The Bay of Claws is a small inland sea that connects to the Korin Gulf. The bay connects 3 states: Tovanis, the Archduchy of Zurast and Lemuria.

A Light on Dark Waters: The bay owes its name to the colossal shards of stone that jut out from beneath its surface. The dark gray rocks are pitted with hundreds of grooves or indentations of unknown origin. In order to avoiding hitting the monoliths on particularly dark nights on the water, the peoples whose livelihood depends on the bay have taken to placing torches, enchanted to never run out of fuel, within the reliefs in the rock. Thus, the claws act as guide posts for sailors traversing the sea.

Adorra-Sound.name: Adorra Sound
description: The Adorra Sound is a large sea north of the continent of Ulfwyst, which is a sub-region of the Mare Concordis. The sound runs along most of the northern coast of Ulfwyst and connects the states of Abbasyr, the Syrothian Empire, the Kaeldrin Sanctum and Navolin.

Strait-of-Krigere.name: Strait of Krigere
description: The Straight of Krigere is a natural waterway that divides the Korin Gulf and Isdrage Bay. The strait is controlled by vessels belonging to the various Clans of Lemuria. On the eastern shore of the straight rests the great city of Kilurus.
